Vibrate to indicate call status
notification, notifications, edge, light, colour, color
Edge lighting makes your screen glow when you receive a notification. This makes it easier to figure when you get a pulse while the phone is doze mode.
Edge lighting
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
System accent color
Notification color
When pulsing, use
reTicker
Replace heads-up notification with slim and less invasive version of redesigned ticker
Use app colored background
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Landscape only
Only enable reTicker when device is in landscape mode
Advanced restart
Show options for recovery and bootloader in power menu
Network traffic indicator
Enable or disable network speed indicator in status bar
Enable "Network traffic indicator"
Options
Hide network traffic indicator when inactive
Hide when the network traffic is below 1 KB/s
Reduce refresh rate
Use 60 Hz screen refresh rate to save power when Battery Saver is on
Link ring & ringtone and notification volumes
App volume
Swipe to screenshot
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Strict standby policy

When dismissing from recents, this will force stop apps with restricted battery usage and impose stronger restrictions to them. Also, all app standby restrictions will be imposed even when device is charging.
Background tasks freezer
Freeze tasks with restricted battery usage when moving them to background and unfreeze them when moving to foreground. This could save battery slightly but may lead to crashes and background ANR.
Tap statusbar to disable
Double-tap the status bar to disable the device
Tap lockscreen to disable
Double-tap on lock screen to disable device
Brightness control
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
